Uses of Class
pizzaProgram.events.Event

Packages that use Event
pizzaProgram.core This package contains the entry point of the program, which initializes the main program window. 
pizzaProgram.database This package contains the core classes for communicating with the database. 
pizzaProgram.database.eventHandlers This package contains classes that listens for read, write and system events. 
pizzaProgram.events All the classes comprising the core of the event system is stored in this package. 
pizzaProgram.gui This package contains classes for initialization of the various GUIs. 
pizzaProgram.gui.EventHandlers This package contains the event handler classes for the GUI. 
pizzaProgram.modules This package contains abstract classes that defines functionality for various modules of the program.

          An event handler for a program exit request
